letters.description: Establish a trusting coach-client relationship and assess the client's birth values, fears, and medical history.
Deliver evidence-based education on labor stages, medical interventions, and the legal rights of the birthing person.
Utilize gravity-neutral and active movement techniques to optimize fetal descent and improve labor efficiency.
Apply hands-on comfort measures, counter-pressure, and sensory modulation for non-pharmacological pain management.
Support the client’s autonomy by facilitating clear communication between the birthing family and the medical team.
Process the birth narrative during the postpartum period to ensure psychological closure, healing, and parental bonding.
